channel.title: Joseph Wang
channel.description: This is an example of how to use rfeed to generate an RSS 2.0 feed

item.title: Markets Weekly February 24, 2024
item.description:
Markets Weekly February 24, 2024
Global Equities Boom (and NVidia earnings) Market meets Fed at 3 Cuts Cool Private Credit Data
item.author: Joseph Wang

item.title: This quota system was how FRBNY operated
item.description:
This quota system was how FRBNY operated as well. I recall staff were about 70% men, but half of management were women. This was due to an unspoken quota system where management promotions must be 1:1 men:women.
Don't play rigged games - build your own.
item.author: Joseph Wang

item.title: Minutes suggest QT is going to continue
item.description: Minutes suggest QT is going to continue longer than expected. Taper could simply be a means to extend QT. At the very least, rate cuts are not an impediment to shrinking the balance sheet.
item.author: Joseph Wang

item.title: Inflation may be turning upwards, but cuts
item.description: Inflation may be turning upwards, but cuts are still coming. The Fed views the world through the lens of real rates, and believes r* is unchanged post-pandemic. They may be overestimating the restrictiveness of policy, but that just means fewer cuts.
item.author: Joseph Wang
